definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
to grow/to nourish/to increase/to cause/juice/taste/(dialect) to spout/to spurt
to grow/to nourish/to increase/to cause/juice/taste/(dialect) to spout/to spurt

sentences.english: Although unstable even walking away, but my heart still flattered it?
sentences.chinese: 虽然连走路都走不稳，但心里还是美滋滋的呢？
我的称赞使她感到美滋滋的。

sentences.english: As she tried on the new coat and hat, the tsar looked on admiringly.
sentences.chinese: 皇后试穿新衣帽时，皇上在一旁美滋滋地看着。

sentences.english: Neighbors Doukua him, listening to heart the old Winn also flattered.
sentences.chinese: 左邻右舍都夸他，老温听了心里也美滋滋的。

sentences.english: I get a kick out of saying . 'This is my wife.
sentences.chinese: 我现在说一声‘这是我的太太’，美滋滋儿的。

sentences.english: I listen to the mother's praise immensely.
sentences.chinese: 我听着妈妈的夸奖心里美滋滋的。

sentences.english: Officials were flattered by empty complements.
sentences.chinese: 官员们被空洞的恭维话弄得心里美滋滋的。

sentences.english: They are regaling on cream cakes.
sentences.chinese: 他们在美滋滋地吃奶油蛋糕。

definition: to feel great/blissful/to be in bliss
see 悠哉悠哉[you1 zai1 you1 zai1]
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
happy/glad/willing (to do sth)/in a cheerful mood
